choices: What do YOU think happens next?
1.content:
My name is Lauren and my dream started when I was crying and I was very upset in my class. My class is called Early Childhood Education at the Tech School and I am in tenth grade. I am sixteen years old. Everybody noticed I was upset so they try to make me feel better by trying to make me laugh. The last thing they decided was that they were gonna tickle my feet. So my shoes dissapeared and two girls came over and tickled my feet. A girl named Linzy tickled my left foot and a girl named Lynette tickled my right foot. I was laughing and giggling so hard since my feet are very ticklish! Eventually, I was feeling better so they stopped tickling my feet. After that, they forgot about me like I didn't exist which made me really mad. A girl behind me slid a finger across my back and poked my sides. I laughed at the touch. "Ooh you're so ticklish!" the girl said. 'Well yeah of course I am. Didn't you see me tickled on my feet?' I thought.

Later, a girl named Jamie and I became friends. She is older than me because a while ago she said she is in 12th grade. So we took a picture together with another girl. After that, I walk home from my class but I wasn't sure where to go so my parents picked me up where I was at. But I kept the feet tickling a secret.

So that's the end of my dream. Unfortunately, I wish this dream was real because I am not tickled by anyone this often and I am very ticklish everywhere. It's so ashame.
1.title: My Dream

11.content:
So here is another adventure of me being tickled!

It was real this time, I was looking at joining a tickle session. I was successful and I found a beautiful young woman named Mandy! It said that she is an expert tickler! I found the address of where we should meet and I found her phone number as well! I called her. "Hello this is Mandy." She said. "Yes hi, my name is Lauren." I said, "And I'm very ticklish everywhere!" "Ok so let's get to the first part, how old are you?" Mandy asked. "Um, I'm 20." I lied. "Oh come on Lauren, tell me how old you really are." Mandy said. "I'm 18." I lied again. "Come on Lauren, you don't sound 18." Mandy said. "Ok fine, I'm 16." I said. And that was my real age. "Lauren, to tell you the truth, I don't tickle anyone who is under 18. But I have a special thing in store for you. Meet me at the park at 3:00 sharp." Mandy said. "Ok, I got it. Thanks Mandy." I said. And so I hung up the phone. "I'm so happy, I'm finally getting a tickle session!" I said, "And just a few more hours!"

A few hours later, I walked outside to the park. I saw Mandy there with another girl. "Wow, I'm getting tickled by double ticklers! This is so exciting!" I said to myself. "Hi Lauren, I'm Mandy. It's nice to meet you." She said, "I'll be your tickler. Oh and this is my friend Audrey. She will be your assistant tickler." "Hi." I said. "So tell me Lauren, are you ticklish?" Mandy said. "Oh yes, I'm very ticklish everywhere!" I admitted. "Well then come with me." Mandy said. And she took my hand to a building. "So how old are you girls?" I asked. "We're both 19." Mandy said. "So your very ticklish?" Audrey said. "Yeah, of course I am. I just told you that. So tie me up good, cause I will squirm all around. I'm really ticklish!" I said. "Alrighty then." Audrey said. And so Mandy and Audrey told me to sit in a chair. They tied me up good. My arms were above my head and my shoes were taken off revealing my beautiful big feet. "Ok, let's get down to business." Mandy said.

I totally wish this was real I really do. This is just a story I made up, so all of you ticklers out there! Come to my house and tickle me! I'm extremely ticklish and I have been waiting to be tickled!
11.title: What do YOU think happens next?

choices: Mandy and Audrey Tickle My Feet!
111.content: Mandy then started to tickle my armpits! That was my worst ticklish spot! Mandy and Audrey tickled me with their fingers very fast. "Ahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaahahahahaahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaah aahaa!" I laughed. Audrey then tickled my sides and stomach. I laughed so hard. "Let's see if she's ticklish on her feet." Mandy said. Then Mandy started tickling my left foot and Audrey tickled my right foot. I laughed. "Ok, let's start with the upperbody first." Mandy said. Then she giggled. "Your laughter is really cute Lauren." Audrey said. Mandy continued to tickle my armpits and Audrey continued to tickle my sides and stomach. "Ahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha!" I laughed. They tickled me for a good five minutes. They eventually stopped. "Wow, Lauren, you're really ticklish," Mandy said. "Yeah, where else are you ticklish at?" Audrey said. "My thighs, the backs of my knees, the back of my neck, even my back and my butt." I explained. "Wow you really are ticklish everywhere." Mandy said. So Mandy tickled my back and the back of my neck while Audrey was tickling my thighs and the backs of my knees. I laughed so hard as I leaned my head back. Mandy and Audrey both had long fingernails and that tickled me more! They tickled me for a good long time. And Mandy tickled my butt for a little bit. "Go for my feet, they're really ticklish. Or should I say, they are the most ticklish." I said. "Really?" Mandy teased. I nodded. Mandy and Audrey grinned evilly. They wiggled their long fingernails at me. "Oh my..." I said.
111.title: Mandy and Audrey Tickle Me!

choices: What would happen to me next?
1111.content:
Mandy and Audrey tickled my feet with their long fingernails very fast. I laughed so hard. "Oh god! Bwahahahahahahahahahahahaha! That tickles! Hehehehehehehehehehehe!" I laughed. "Wow your feet seem more ticklish than your upperbody." Mandy said. I nodded. "I totally regret this." I said. "Well you signed up for it cause that's too bad." Audrey said. "And besides, we like tickling you now." Mandy said. It has been thirteen minutes since I was tickled everywhere! "In three minutes, we'll stop tickling you now ok?" Mandy said. I nodded and said, "Ok."

I still laughed and giggled while I can enjoy it. To tell ya the truth, I actually like it, I don't regret it at all. I never called for help or begged for it to stop. I just enjoyed it, laid back and laughed. I have never been tickled this much in my life. And this is my very first tickle session! So Mandy and Audrey tickled my feet for three more minutes and then they stopped. The total of my tickle session was 16 minutes! "So Lauren, how was your tickle session?" Mandy said. "It..was..great." I said, "I actually like it. I've never felt this much happy in my life. Thank you Mandy. Thank you Audrey!" Then I gave them both a hug. "So are you coming next time?" Audrey asked. "Oh yes." I said, "I'll come back anytime I feel down."

"That's great." Mandy said. And so I got up as they untied me. "Seeya next time Lauren!" Mandy and Audrey said. "Ok seeya." I said. And with that, I left feeling very cheerful!


I wish I had a tickle session for real, if you readers know anything about a tickle session, just tell me cause I need to be tickled and I really need a tickle. I get jealous if anyone else gets tickled and I don't. So if you people have anything, tell me! And for the last time, this is not real. It's just a story I made up. I never dreamed about it either.

THE END!
1111.title: Mandy and Audrey Tickle My Feet!

11112.content:
Introduction:

So like I am hanging out somewhere waiting for Rick to arrive. We started talking to each other by email on Writing.com and then on Gmail! Rick and I are members on this website. Anyway, today I am having my first tickling session at his place. This is the first time I'm having it and I am so happy because I don't get tickled by anyone this often. I am visiting where Rick is which is New York. So he finally arrived. "Yay!" I said. He looked ok for a typical kind of guy. "Hey, it's me Lauren." I said. "Hey I'm Rick, nice to meet you." He said. And so we went inside his place to a room.

I laid down on the bed. "Tie me up good, I'll squirm." I said. "Ok." Rick said, "So you're ticklish huh?" "Yeah, very." I said. So my arms were above my head and my feet were bare. "Alright so I'm gonna find where your ticklish spots are." Rick said, "You ready?" "Yup." I said.

I was so excited that I could hardly wait for my tickling session to begin!
11112.title: My First Tickling Session!

111121.content:
And the tickling began! First he started where I am the most ticklish which is my feet. He stroked a finger on my left foot and then on my right foot! Then he tickled my feet a little faster! I was cracking up right away cause my feet are so ticklish! I really enjoyed having my feet tickled, I never yelled for help or beg for it to stop!

So what happens next? Does Rick keep tickling my feet or does he tickle me somewhere else?
111121.title: Tickling Begins!

1111211.content:
So Rick kept tickling my feet. "Wow you were right Lauren, your feet are ticklish, very ticklish." He said. I was laughing way too hard to answer Rick. "Now let's see where else you're ticklish." He said. And so he started tickling the backs of my knees. I giggled and squirmed. Rick could see that it was another one of my weak spots. So he kept tickling the backs of my knees.

After a few minutes of tickling the backs of my knees, he started tickling my inner thighs. I kicked my legs and laughed cause I was also very ticklish there. I really enjoyed being tickled like that. I have never even been tickled for a long period of time either. So what happens next? Find out in this next exciting chapter!
1111211.title: Keeps tickling my feet

11112111.content:
Rick kept tickling my inner thighs. After a few minutes, he started tickling my sides and stomach. I laughed so hard because I was ticklish there too! After that, he tickled my armpits, another one of my ticklish spots. I laughed and kicked and squirmed. Rick then tickled the back and sides of my neck. I shrugged my shoulders. He then tickled my shoulders too. "Wow Lauren, you were right. You are ticklish everywhere." Rick said. I laughed so hard that I couldn't answer him. He then tickled my chest and went down to my ribs. I was ticklish there too.

After that, Rick stopped tickling me. "Hmm, I wonder if you are ticklish." I said. "I am, I'm just not going to tell you where I am ticklish." He said. "Oh yeah, then I guess I'll have to find out." I said. I broke free from my bonds and pinned Rick down.

Now's my turn to tickle Rick. What'll happen next?
11112111.title: Keeps tickling my inner thighs

111121111.content:
After that, I went for Rick's sides and armpits. He laughed so hard. I grinned cause I was happy that he was ticklish just like me. I kept going there until he burst out laughing. It has been an hour so I've decided to stop.

So yeah, I am very ticklish everywhere! So if you live near me, email me so you can come and tickle me cause I'm extremely ticklish! Tickle me! Haha!
111121111.title: Tickle him!

1111211111.content:
"I will see you next time maybe." Rick said. "I hope so, seeya." I said. Rick then waved to me. I waved back. It seemed to him that he loved to tickle me. I am ticklish everywhere and I have such a sweet laugh and I'm very pretty. It also looked like his tickle fetish took over his brain! It took over mine too cause I do love to tickle but what I really love is that I am tickled by someone. So yeah, please come over and tickle me cause I'm very ticklish, more than anybody else!

THE END!
1111211111.title: Epilogue

11112111111.content:

11112111111.title: List of My Ticklish Spots!

12.content:
A few months later Linzy invited me to a sleepover on a Friday night. I was surprised because we did not really hang out together or chat that much. It seemed to be good enough and I did not have anything else planned. The invitation just said that some party games were intended.

After a good long shower I chose my dress. After pondering I chose matching black bra and panties, a magenta top and a dark skirt of medium length. Assuming that we would hang around a lot I decided againts a pantyhose and pro bare legs. A spare bikini was packed in my handbag. My parents dutyfully drove me to her place. It was a nice house with a large garden. When I rang the door bell I saw that...

- there were only girls

- there were boys and girls

- Linzy was alone
12.title: The sleepover
